PERSONA:
meet robert, a 58-year-old white, married, and devoutly protestant man residing in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. born and raised in the united states, robert is a college graduate with some post-graduate education under his belt. he comes from an upper-income family, earning over $100,000 annually.

robert is a staunch conservative who leans towards the republican party and attends religious services weekly as a born-again or evangelical christian. his political ideology aligns with the very conservative end of the spectrum, and he is registered to vote at his current address.

in his free time, robert actively participates in volunteerism and frequently uses the internet, almost constantly. despite his traditional leanings, he embraces technology and stays connected online.

overall, robert is a well-educated, financially stable, and religiously devoted individual deeply rooted in his conservative values and republican political affiliation. his persona reflects the intersection of his demographic characteristics, socioeconomic status, and deeply held beliefs.
